docs.title: About Me
docs.text: Recent graduate with an MS in Mathematics and a passion for making software that works for educators. Strong communication skills with experience explaining technical analyses to shareholders and non-technical audiences. Skilled in data analysis, including data ingestion with SQL, cleaning and analysis with Python, SPSS, and Julia, and interpretation and dissemination of results. Familiar with front-end languages and frameworks like HTML, React and Node.js, and interested in gaining more experience in full-stack development. Able to rapidly pick up new languages and concepts and to adapt prior experience to novel scenarios.

Java, Simulation 6/2020 - 5/2022 DecapodesDocumentationMultiphysics simulation software designed with a high level of modularity, using concepts from applied category theory to make a tool which allows both rapid modeling as well as fine-tuned descriptions of dynamic systems. Julia, Simulation, Multiphysics
